performance.description: Your use of minimax with alpha-beta pruning is efficient and appropriate for this project.
You can further optimize your evaluation function by breaking early if a win is detected, or by only checking relevant board areas for streaks.
Consider weighting streaks of three higher than streaks of two for a more nuanced evaluation, as suggested in the project. This can make your AI stronger without much extra computation.
